verses.text: They that trust in the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** shall be* as mount Zion, which* cannot be removed, but* abideth for ever.
As the mountains are* round about Jerusalem, so the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** is* round about his people from henceforth even for ever.
For the rod of the wicked shall not rest upon the lot of the righteous; lest the righteous put forth their hands unto iniquity.+ 125.3 the wicked: Heb. wickedness*
Do good, O \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**, unto those that be* good, and to them that are* upright in their hearts.
As for such as turn aside unto their crooked ways, the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** shall lead them forth with the workers of iniquity: but* peace shall be* upon Israel.
